addons.description: This add-on allows access to the concert section of the French/German broadcaster Arte.
addons.disclaimer: Dieses Add-on wird von keiner Sendeanstalt unterstützt und ist daher inoffiziell.
addons.name: plugin.audio.arteconcert
addons.summary: This add-on allows access to the concert section of the French/German broadcaster Arte.

addons.description: Browse and play video, music and photo media files managed by Plex Media Server.[CR][CR]Fork of PleXBMC by Hippojay
addons.disclaimer: Composite ist KEIN offizielles Plex Add-on und wird von Plex weder unterstützt noch gebilligt.
addons.name: plugin.video.composite_for_plex
addons.news:
[add] Combined Sections to main menu
[add] Composite Playlist to main menu, create a playlist based the information you provide
[add] Composite context menu for library and widgets
    - adds Play Transcoded, Mark as un/watched
[add] Section selection for Kodi Library support
[add] settings to included watched content in combined 'Recently Added Episodes/Movies' sections
[chg] Remove HTTPS from settings and move Certificate Verification from settings to Manage Servers

addons.description: Mixcloud is re-thinking radio. Listen to great radio shows, Podcasts and DJ mix sets on-demand.
addons.name: plugin.audio.mixcloud
addons.news:
v3.0.0 (2020-03-04)
      [new] python 3 migration
      [new] new logo, icons and other art

addons.description: Music plugin to access over 30000 international radio broadcasts from rad.io, radio.de, radio.fr, radio.pt and radio.es[CR]Currently features[CR]- English, german, french translated[CR]- Browse stations by location, genre, topic, country, city and language[CR]- Search for stations[CR]- 115 genres, 59 topics, 94 countrys, 1010 citys, 63 languages
addons.name: plugin.audio.radio_de
addons.news:
v3.0.3+matrix.6 (1/5/2020)
            [fix] Custom stations if the url is not a playlist
            [new] Spanish website radio.es and improved translations
            [new] screenshot support for addon-website

addons.description: This add-on allows you to listen to all the podcast of the emission programmes from the spanish national radio RNE website.[CR]From the add-on settings menu, it can be configured to navigate through all the programmes, or just currently on emission (default).
addons.name: plugin.audio.rne
addons.news:
Version 1.3.1+matrix.1
             * Quick fix due to loglevel deprecation on matrix release.
addons.summary: Listen to all the podcast from RNE.

addons.description: Scoot Media Streamer allows you to stream media from any SMS Server available on the internet. If you have a media server at home with SMS Server installed you can stream your media anywhere to a number of devices. This is the official Kodi addon which allows you to stream media from your SMS Server to any Kodi compatable device.
addons.disclaimer: This plugin requires an instance of SMS Server to be available remotely or on the local network.
addons.name: plugin.video.sms
addons.news:
v0.1.0
- Update to support latest SMS Server
addons.summary: The official Kodi addon for Scoot Media Streamer.

addons.description: With this Add-on you can browse more than 50.000 free internet radio stations. Current Features:[CR]- Top 500 Stations[CR]- Browse by genre (and subgenre if enabled in settings)[CR]- Search Station by name[CR]- Search Stations by current playing track[CR]- You can manage a "My Stations"-list[CR]- bitrate and amount of listeners visible and sortable[CR]- 500 Stations on each Page (can be changed in the settings)[CR]- uses cache (24h genre, 1h station listings)
addons.name: plugin.audio.shoutcast
addons.news:
2.5.0+matrix.1 (12.4.2020) - matrix edition
            - Remove python2 support
            - Remove simplejson
            - New language folder layout
            - Automated submissions to matrix branch
            - Addon.xml cosmetics
addons.summary: more than 50.000 free internet radio stations
